entries.name: Sentinel-2 L2A
entries.description: Baseline multispectral data source for many EO production workflows.

entries.name: Landsat Collection 2
entries.description: Long-term calibrated archive for time-series analysis.

entries.name: PlanetScope Daily Imagery
entries.description: Commercial high-frequency imagery for near-daily monitoring use cases.

entries.name: SWOT Hydrology Products
entries.description: Emerging water-surface data products with strong scientific upside.

entries.name: Uncalibrated Third-Party Feeds
entries.description: Avoid for critical analytics unless provenance and calibration are verified.
